61.review_text: cozy place, staf very kindly, we've got room in 7F connecting 3 room... so we can chat easily and the infant (1y4m) can play around with us..... breakfast was so delicious,,,, over all is best for my trip this year

62.review_text: I am giving this hotel 2 stars because it's walking distance to the Petronas Twin Towers, malls and restaurants so it's very convenient. But it was also a drawback because we were given a room at the front of the hotel and it was very noisy. You can hear the traffic all throughout the night which meant not getting good sleep.  The room they gave us was obviously on a smoking floor. The smell of cigarette smoke was very strong when you get off the elevator. I thought, this is fine as long as the room does not smell like cigarette smoke. It was fine when we got into the room but throughout the night, the smell of cigarette smoke kept coming and going, I guess through the vents. It was just awful.  As for the state of the hotel, it's old and could use an upgrade. The furniture are…

63.review_text: Staff are simply amazing. They went all the way to ensure my trip was an enjoyable one and also make sure I can keep my things safe while I am doing my shopping.  The room got smokey smell after you leave and come back The location is best for KL shopping trip very near to LRT.

64.review_text: Room was clean. New carpet and delicious food. Friendly staff and checking in and out, super fast. Recommended for family too. Distance to KLCC and Pavilion shopping centre are within walking distance. We will definitely make a return to this hotel again in the near future. Really enjoy my holiday. 👍👍👍👍👍 The swimming pool is also clean. Breakfast serves sumptuous food.  Very convenient and excellent stay.

65.review_text: The room itself was nothing special but clean and tidy. We had a look at the pool area which seems like great place to hang out in the heat.  Breakfast was great. We were lucky enough to step out the front door of the hotel and have a food truck market available for dinner. Amazing! Best thing for us was that Aeroline buses departed straight out the front.

66.review_text: The Dondang Sayang is understaffed. Because there was only one permanent staff member clearing up the tables, two supervisors had to help clear up tables as more guests came.  Quite a  wait for food trays to be refilled that most people were left with no choice but to queue up for egg dishes. Choice of dishes is limited anyway, and when the trays do get filled up, they were quickly emptied in no time.   Suffice to say, the management has  to look seriously into this matter.  Increase your F&B staff for a more efficient and much more pleasant ambience in your dining hall. You will make your staff and your guests happier, while also doing your part to employ those in need of  a job.

67.review_text: Spending our Christmas holiday at Corus KL .We had our family dinner at Ming Palace and it was superb..  Variety of delicious  food . Great service by the F&B staff . Thank you Miss Tan and Jong and Rosman  . Definitely  will come and dine again.

68.review_text: Excellent food, thumbs up for the unagi which melts in your mouth, garlic fried rice with the correct rice texture, and the nice soft chewy mochi(though personally i prefer the paste inside to be less sweet). Ambience is excellent and relaxing.

69.review_text: Reasonable price, yummy breakfast. But check in process took time a bit. Breakfast area was quite dark. (Because I love having meal on lighted atmosphere). Greatest location for KL sightseeing near Twin towers and LRT.

70.review_text: As on a business trip, I would say hotel is very good, maintained and location is very good. One week visit, I had some issues with cockroaches in toilets, but after spraying all disappeared. Also, breakfast need to include more courses other than dominant Asian food.

71.review_text: Thamay gave a good service. The ambience in Corus hotel is nice. The hotel is near to the KLCC and shopping malls hence it truly is easy for us to travel. The staffs is friendly and efficient especially the female cleaner working on 21st December 2019 on the 9th floor looking forward to coming here again next year :)

72.review_text: My family always stays in Corus hotel whenever we visit Kuala Lumpur.  The only disappointment was the breakfast. There was not much choices and the only meat they serve everyday was sausage. I think the hotel need to improve on their breakfast.

73.review_text: We stayed from 16 dec 2019 till 20 dec 2019. On 18 dec and 19 dec, the water from the faucet and shower turned dark like the colour of dark tea. We informed reception but was told that similar complaints were received from other rooms. No effort was made to rectify or offer alternatives to us. The dirty water has somewhat caused inconvenience to us. And there was no communication on the hotel's part to explain the dirty water phenomena and no follow up was done.

74.review_text: In a good area to stay and nearby have shopping mall. Parking is FOC for hotel guest. Room is clean and everything is fine except mid-night can hear of the water flushing sound from top level. For me is fine as just a short stay.

75.review_text: Corus hotel Walking distance to KLCC. Hotel is clean just a bit rundown. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Bring cable extension for your device. Lack of plug point. Overall I recommend to stay at Corus. Good value for money.

76.review_text: Repeated stay as convenient to travel to and from Singapore with Aeroline. Staff are friendly and helpful. I was given a room with balcony when I checked in and the view was good. Definitely will stay again for the good location.

77.review_text: Great location ( walking distance to so many mall ). The room need a new looks ( modern and simple ). Please prepare more wide variation of breakfast menu. Front desk and bell boy are very helpful and friendly.

78.review_text: Chosen Corus cause of location.   While I'm on business family can shop around KLCC.   Location is definitely the advantage for both business and shopping as CBD and major hopping complexes are within vacinity.  staff are friendly and always. serve with a smile.   The housekeeping staffs are helpful and polite.  One thing is that as the hotel is aged, the refurbishment seemed not up to my expectation.  Except for the carpet, nithing seemed new/refurbished as I stayed couples years ago.  For this the value for money rates lower.  All in all, good ocation and excellent services.

79.review_text: Booked normal room near the swimming pool area.  Upon checking-in my girl found that the room was old & stale air.  Decided to do an upgrade room to Executive.  which is much much better.  of course add'l charges applied.    2 mins walk to the Food Truck @ Setapak.  abt 8 mins walk to KLCC.   surroundings are great where u can find shopping mall all in walking distance if you lazy to walk to KLCC.  will try other hotel (which i find that worth the $ spend than Corus) when we go KL again.

80.review_text: Awesome service from the staffs .... An extra mile service from one Abu Bakar on 8th Dec 2019, who assisted us to retrieve our loss item. Much appreciated from us for the help rendered to connect with the relevant party.

81.review_text: Definitely not a 4-star hotel.  The room was disappointing with a horrible smell.  A lot of hidden charges.  Hotel staff not so friendly and not accommodating.  My husband and I got a room with twin beds despite choosing the option of a single bed in agoda.com.  Definitely we will not stay in this hotel or recommend it.

82.review_text: Breakfast was below expectation. Food almost all gone by 9.15am. And doesn't seem to be refilled. One lady manning the egg stall and the noodles stall, so the eggs were poorly prepared. Would be better off walking down the road and have breakfast at the local coffee stalls.

83.review_text: I booked 2 adjoining rooms at a premium non-smoking floor. The neighbour decided to change that rule by smoking at the balcony and the smoke was overwhelming in my room. When I told the hotel management, they offered to put air fresher in my room or give me another room (separate from my adjoining room).   Shouldn’t they address the issue with the smoking guy who flouted the rule instead of uprooting me to another room and separating me from my family who stayed in my adjoining room?  After years of staying in this hotel, I will not come here again.

84.review_text: Just had quick dinner at the lounge , space were good and more reclaims atmosphere, and it’s good have my guinness stout with nasi goreng , it’s sounds weird it’s good, the nasi can be more better , it’s bit oily and the chicken wings were has blood inside and the smells like flour . Maybe the chicken can be fried for longer and the less oil on the goreng part . Other than service part were excellent

85.review_text: very poor service experience, got offered twin bed room while booked for large bed room, and was asked to top up 20 RM if to exchange to a large bed room. was not allowed to build the room service charge to the room, but need to pay at the spot.

86.review_text: Excellent location, walking distance to KLCC and shopping streets & malls. Vibrant nightlife, with an interesting array & choice of restaurants, street food & culinary experiences. Moving about is easy with Grab, taxis & trains.

87.review_text: Nice location; 1. Very close to shopping complex & tourist attraction places (K_Avenue, KLCC & etc). 2. Near to public transport station (LRT station). 3. At night can enjoy a great dinner at food truck station beside the hotel.

88.review_text: We stayed for two days at the hotel. Its true that is not the newest, still good and clean. The location is great, close to everything in the center. Walk distance to the towers, or to the biggest mall in KL. The room was on the second floor, for me perfect, as the pool, gym and sauna are there. The breakfast was OK, I'm vegan, there been more options then in other places, so I was satisfied. The staff very helpful and friendly. The best way to  ome and go to the airport is by grab taxi, as the charge 65 ringer one way, just download the app. Works perfectly and you don't have to bargain with the other taxi drivers. Next time I will use the train, to see the service works. It was great visit to an amazing city, Kuala Lumpur will back for sure.

89.review_text: Hotel is 8-10 minutes walk to KLCC. There is an underpass in 1 building away. After this builiding, it will be shelter all the way to KLCC & train station. A convenient location. Room is big & wifi is strong.  Breakfast is average, needs improvement. Staff is friendly. Overall a pleasant stay & a happy guest.

90.review_text: This hotel is great! The location is fantastic. It is only a few minutes' walk from the Petronas towers, public transport, shopping malls and restaurants etc. The staff are friendly and helpful. The room was clean and tidy with cold fridge and working aircon. The food is great, and Wifi and TV is good as well. The pool is great, with poolside service included.The property could do with a bit of outside maintenance, but there was nothing that put us off the hotel. We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend to other travelers as well.

91.review_text: Hotel was good and had excellent location at the center of KL..Should improve breakfast spread and in room service.. I had to call the technician twice to understand the hot water system..  I will recommend this hotel , if the above points are taken care off..

92.review_text: Never a dull moment. The nearby Food Truck.The nearby KLCC MRT station.The nearby KLCC.The nearby K Avenue. Everything you want, it's just right in front of you! All the staff extremely friendly. The room clean and superb!

93.review_text: We had our party at the Corus Hotel with 60 guests. Joe and his team support was perfect before the party, during the party and after the party. I really appreciate Corus Hotel team’s wonderful support and perfect meals.

94.review_text: Happening dinner with marvelous foods, fresh n very tasted. Great entertain by restaurant team especially Ina..thanks.. Grill Eel make my day..very privacy n comfort. Good for family gathering.price reasonable. Highly recommended

95.review_text: Thank you for the amazing dinner tonight. INA was very kind and passionate to serve us and very polite, friendly while explaining us about the set menu. The food very delicious and we all had enjoyed our dinner. Once again thank you to INA who had serve us.

96.review_text: We value the excellent service given by Mr Ron Raniel (front office assistant) and the housekeeping team for the excellent job. Your excellent service make the hotel more outstanding in terms of the image

97.review_text: This hotel easy to get food, transportation to travel and near leisure place. i have a good experience and enjoy the environment. Here i have very good hospitality from the staff and have value of money.

98.review_text: Hotel has very good localization. Close to city mall and also Petronas Twins towers. Some hotel should be renovated. Breakfast is ok but not for me. I am alergic on see food and fish that howt was only eggs for me and hohland cheese. Noodle was with fish sauce or oystern sauce.  Very nice staff. They offer ftansfer from hotel to airport 150 MR for 4 adult people and 7 laguages.

99.review_text: Corus hotel was provided very good service for customer and although you delayed or forget to check out they wont keep on call you. For this trip planned stay here for 1 nights becomes 2 night stays here. Breakfast got a lot of types you can be choose and if you have any requests just mention it and they will provide for u

100.review_text: I found bedbugs at 10cm of my face in the blankets, worst experience ever. Had to leave the hotel when I woke up and go to another hotel. I have traveled a lot but I have never experienced this, I would have never thought that I would find bedbugs for a so expensive hotel. TERRIBLE

1.review_text: Breakfast selection not many choices like a few years ago i came to this hotel.You are not providing enough food because of the group had finished all the food by 8am, luckily i came to the restaurant early morning,but i not enjoyed the menu and the food not good taste.. The toilet also not clean, rusty water come from the shower. Another one i get a towel with hole, i just use a towel because they are clean..   I was dissapointed because the facilities at coffee session were incomplete, i had to ask the staff send to my room, but i am satisfied with the staff services.. Very alert and fast services..  And channel tv also boring.. My family just enjoy the night and swimming pool.. That's all..

2.review_text: Best hotel in KL. Near LRT, shopping mall, easy access to everywhere. You don't have to worry if hungry. Foodpanda dan grabfood are everywhere.   The staffs are very polite and helpful. They are really nice, always smiling at you and also ready to serve you.

3.review_text: Will visit again for sure. I love the layout of this hotel. From the car park to the lobby, easy access thru the lift or stairs. Lobby is big enough, the cafe, and the glass lift facing Bangunan UMNO is so amazing. Fully carpeted, walk to the room and the doors are secured, and room is clean & smell nice. Beds are clean & soft. Pillows are soft. Lights all working well. Toilets are perfect, shower is too good with high water pressure, only TV channels are poor. Haha nevermind, because i hate watching TV. Overall, this hotel is a must visit & stay. Trust me, All good for. Welldone!

4.review_text: Very good stay despite C19 MCO imposed period.  Keep up the good work.  Perhaps needs to have a simple breakfast like in smaller hotels in Europe/Britain during this MCO with just fruits and assorted breads with butter and jam some coffee or tea as not many guest simple arrangement for guest to come down and eat would kill the boredom.

5.review_text: Friendly staff and everything is worth the money you paid for. The pool area need a little update as it is a bit of rundown..else everything is good! Didnt try the gym..so couldn’t comment on that. Breakfast was not bad! Would definately stay again.

6.review_text: Good place to stay when in KL for work and pleasure  Our second home every time we come to KL   Convenient location to have my business meetings as well as meeting our family members and friends Sadly - no more live music, which was available in the old days. The music lounge near the coffee house should have been retained. Smoking rooms on some floors should be made available. We know that many of the hotel regular customers are hard-core smokers.

7.review_text: A good getaway in mid of city, value for money. A refreshing stay considering long period staying at home, while following the SOP during MCO period. Will definitely come back in future for another stay.

8.review_text: Very decent and value for money.  Location is pretty good. Not central KL but connectivity is excellence. Ktm is nearbt and and LRT station is just 3mins away from the hotel. Theres a sunway putra mall right opposite. Very convinient!  The hotel itself quite old so dont expect any modern design but its quite charming.   Staff were amazing. Very professional yet friendly. Warm and always helpful. Their hospitality was one of the best in KL.   My room kinda dated but complete. Clean and decent size. I got quite a good view of KLCC from my room on the 15th floor. Comfortable mattress but pillow were squishy.  Theres a bathtub, hair dryer, and in room slippers. No bathrobe tho. Old tv with multiple local and movie channels  Theres also two hidden cupboard next to the window , one…

9.review_text: short stay yet mesmerizing...couldn't wait for our next visit. cleanliness, warm welcome, easy access to dining, shopping, spacious room, cozy comfy feeling throughout our stay. best for a weekend escape, family staycation, couples on honeymoon etc.

10.review_text: Me and my friend had an amazing time staying here with a balcony overlooking the kl city from our room! Ms Hilda was very kind attending to all our needs and inquiries. Also, Hamizie from Deli Cafe was excellent too! Overall we had fun staying here for 3 days 2 nights and will definitely recommend it!

11.review_text: Duty Manager Hilda giving a Good Hospitality service when approached to her. Very friendly and nice. Keep up the the Good work. Room cleanliness was Superb! Especially Bed was done very neat. Bathroom was very clean! Good quality of Housekeeping staff !  Will definitely comeback to Seri Pacific Hotel!

12.review_text: This hotel has high standard in term of cleanliness which gave us high confident to stay here. Check-in and check-out hotel very quick and we were welcomed by very friendly staff. Highly recommended .

13.review_text: This is the first hotel in Malaysia that I saw using the UV light system (UVGI) in the foyer, very critical place - cigar room and maybe more i thing.. as a continuous eradication to control the covid-19 pandemic.

14.review_text: Spacious room, but the rest all are old.  Very small old tv with poor choice of stations.  Air Cond not cold enough at max speed & lowest temperature. Toilet/bath tub with dirty stains.  Stained kettle. Old iron & iron board. No laundry bag.

15.review_text: keep it up..your service are among he best. Your location are strategic, service of receptionist are very good and they are very helpful. May be can add the choice of meal during breakfast. Also team of housekeeping are very nice

16.review_text: Very satisfied with the hotel itself, the staff and the location. Everything is good about this hotel. Free parking. The room is big. Working table is available. There is also a sofa in the room. Bed is comfortable. Clean and tidy.

17.review_text: Welcoming and enticing. A short enjoyable stay..hassle free, i love the hotel scent. would like to come back again. unfortunately, no family room. can think of preparing a few rooms for big family size.

18.review_text: I chose Seri Pacific AGAIN prior to my previous visits. Even a 50% rebate offer it was still arguably expensive than its surrounding hotels. To my worst nightmare, the room offered was seem to be rundown. Peeling off wallpaper, Rundown and poor lighting in toilet and bathroom. Walkway to the room was dark and stuffy,I mean what happened to walkway air-conditioning. In short, the room was not welcoming at all. We decided to shorten our stay to one night, but your manager in-charge won't agree and kept forcing on penalty. She gave us an upgrade stating all your rooms are fully renovated which gave me scare to think your level of renovation is. Again  the upgraded room was better but adding to our  disappointment  we found a used face mask on the sofa. Where is Seri Pacifics…

19.review_text: good choice for those who looking for hotels which has access to shopping complex. even we are not dine in in hotel, we have variety of restaurants to be selected.    other aspects, good customer service from the moments we arrived there until the time to check out.

20.review_text: I love the upper floor as i enjoyed the view of Kuala Lumpur skyline. Could find fault with the hotel facilities and the location. Definitely will come back soon for another memorable stay-cation in the near future

21.review_text: Great overall performance. The room was clean upon arrival. Bunch of food selection at Zende restaurant. Love the concept of male staff wearing baju melayu as it portrayed sense of traditional value .

22.review_text: I stayed here for a 3 nights on family and business trip. this hotel is located at hearth of the city center, a place that public loves to hangout. the hotel seems quite old and not attractive. The room was quite spacious, clean, air conditioned, provided with tv. The price of the room is affordable.  however, this hotel has pool for kids and adult. I had to say that it wasn't really a good hotel but the location is so good that i had to ignore the other aspect. overall, poor hotel in great location, will consider to come here again.

23.review_text: As usual, nice and expected trip in mind.. Great location, really pleasant and clean rooms, but the thing that makes this such a good place to stay are the staff. All of the people are incredibly helpful and generous with their time and advice. We stay with six year old child, mostly child time in the bath tub with most convenient...not sharing with shower area

24.review_text: The location is very strategic. Connected to pwtc and infront of sunway putra mall. Near to the lrt station, easy to walk around. Good services. Nice staff👍. The room so comfortable n also the so delicious. Very nice hotel.

25.review_text: Standard watch agencies should exclude this hotel from the booking list because they book a 5 star facility.  When you go to the hotel, there is no 2Star facility. Drinking water is not available from the hotel because it is available

26.review_text: when I stay at this hotel, I feel it is comfortable and safety, the staff here are nice, and helpfulness. if there is one thing to talk about, it is I will wish breakfast can provide hot soup for me. I stay at this hotel for business reason, I have to work everyday, the airconditionner would get colder at midnight, when I get up in the early morning, I will hope to have a hot soup, to boost up my energy for work. anyway, during my stay in your hotel, I feel good and comfortable.

27.review_text: The room was verry nice deco.. Very nice location. Jockey staff was verry friendly. But front desk.. And restaurant staff.. Not so... Hmm, maybe tired. And i think.. Maybe they prefer to attend vip class only. Huhuhu. For room review. Such as a nice room. A bit dispointed cause i book for king size bed.. But what i get double bed combine.. So.. I get back pain when i wakeup.. Huhuhu. The tub also not in a good condition.. So overall review.. It still a nice hotel to check in.. Hopefully for the next visit.. I get a better experience

28.review_text: The hotel cleanliness is immaculate, we got a window view of KLCC during the night it’s majestic. Breakfast had a variety to select, malay, Indian, Chinese, International buffet. All is good except the Wifi is extremely slow, need to improve on that.

29.review_text: Pleasant and warmth hospitality. Strategic location. Staff are very pleasant and attentive. Cafe Zenda has a wide selection. Somehow during my stay it was too crowded which create little unpleasant environment.

30.review_text: The family room was so convenience. The room design which having 2 separate bathroom and toilet was so handiness to user. The room is well design although the space is limited. The room view is awesome. The safety of the room is also in placed.

31.review_text: The location is near transport station but the hotel is very old fashion, everything is old and dirty, I think I will not book this hotel next time. One the other hand, the morning buffet breakfast is not good.

32.review_text: On my business trip to KL, my travel agency selected Seri Pacific Hotel for me to spend my week business trip there! Despite of very near shopping mall ( Sunway Putra Mall), just across the street, the facilities providing by the hotel was not satisfactory! 1- I just change my dress in Toilet, when I wanted to swim in the pool!!!! which was not healthy at all!!!! there was no separate place to change and keep your things in the locker for using pool. 2- My room was not sound proof because I could hear the voice of nearby rooms and baby crying all the time  3- I could see dirt on pillow covers of my bed and even upon my hint was not change. Thanks

33.review_text: Had a wonderful birthday hi tea at Zende Restaurant, Seri Pacific Hotel. Food was very delicious , amazing dessert and excellent services. Mrs. Masuita did really amazing job.We really enjoyed your warm hospitality,feels so welcome with love. Thank you very much for the complimentry slice cheese cake too. It's really nice. We will be back again,for sure. Great food , lovely ambiance and amazing services. Thank you all.

34.review_text: Overall, the stay at the hotel was good. The rooms were very clean and the separation of the sink and water closet made it feel hygenic. The staff were responsive but sometimes seemed tense and needs to smile a bit more.

35.review_text: We had check in a group of people for a vacation. We have encountered unprofessional and disrespectful behavior from staff at restaurant to hv Morning breakfast. We took this to management notice to fix, however we seen the same on the very next day. Our experience, they hv very poor communication mechanism inside the hotel, customer info didn't pass inside the hotel easily.

36.review_text: Seri Pacific is affordable hotel with location 3km NW from KLCC. The building itself is old fashioned grey 30 storey concrete building. Hotel is just next to Sunway Putra mall, you can access the mall using overpass. Also, you can access via overpass PWTC train station from where you reach KLCC quickly. Also, Putra Komuter train station is also very close - if you want to go to Batu caves, don’t waste 60 ringgit by going there using hotel tour service. Go there with Komuter in 25 mins and 2 ringgits.  Hotel lobby is modern with quality surfaces. All workers are very helpfull and polite - as a Finn I felt sometimes little awkward all that attention we got.  We had our room in 24th floor. Elevators are fast and there is plenty of them. We had deluxe room - it was rather small for…

37.review_text: Not stayed here for a while but booked a stay whilst transiting KL for Indonesia. Standards maintained but some renovation work since my last visit made it an even better experience. Excellent value, opposite KL train station (PWCC). Would definitely stay there again when in KL. Special mention to Kenneth on reception for being so helpful.

38.review_text: People are truly helpful and nice. Staff member are efficient and smile!  Service is high level and the warmth of the people is great because guests feel at home. I will come back as the experience was great

39.review_text: Will come again soon.. Easy access to shopping complex, good surrounding, clean n neat, staff is friendly, big space at lobby, fast lift although stay up at level 13..overall one of the best hotel i ever stayed.. Good job..

40.review_text: We have visited KL many times and always find staying at the Seri easy. We were upgraded to a room with a beautiful view of the Petronas Towers and had wonderful service by Mahumad Fozie and his team.  The location is easy access to everything as the train station (which is fantastic in KL) is across the road from the hotel and cheap. Starbucks also across the road when you need a good hit of coffee, shopping centre, pharmacy.  Would recommend staying.

41.review_text: Stayed here for a night on the 18th floor. Room was spacious! Love the view too. Everything was up to my expectation. The room came with a free bfast too. Will definitely come here again. Accessable to the PWTC lrt station and the Sunway Putra Mall, which is just across the road.

42.review_text: The bed is too hard, pillow to soft until like no pillow at all. They have different kind of pillow but we are require to pay which first time I have this kind of experience. The rain showers is too loud and the we can heard outside ppl talk too.

43.review_text: This stay was very pleasant and this hotel is a very interesting quality/value option. The rooms are very good, all the facilities correspond to a very high standard and the restaurants are also very good.

44.review_text: As a new breastfeeding mother who attending workshop training at the hotel, I'm feeling  absolutely thankful to the staff who promptly arranging a room for me upon my request. They are helpful and responsive..

45.review_text: Location wise - good place to stay and shopping near to train  easy to travel around, but not enough parking when its shared with PWTC events . In future must not share parking with non- hotel guest. Your guest is your main customer.

46.review_text: Good location, varieties of food in breakfast and tasty. Immediate response if you call the housekeeping. Face towel and Body Moisturizer, Bath Foam will be provided on demand basis. Very good view of Pertonas Tower from my room. We enjoyed New Year Fire crackers show from our room

47.review_text: Our stay as usual was excellent. The staff are welcoming, efficient, friendly. This is why it has been our hotel of choice in KL for the past 7 years.  We were living in Cameron Highlands and every chance we had we went to KL and stayed at Seri Pacific Hotel. We have left Malaysia now but if we ever come back Seri Pacific will be our choice of hotel. Thanks to all the staff of Seri Pacific Hotel.

48.review_text: Well situated for business meetings; good food and convenient suite of meeting rooms. Air conditioning too cold in meeting rooms, but staff were responsive to change that upon request. Towels in rooms got changed daily despite asking not to do so for environmental reasons; I am always very disappointed when this request is ignored. Apart from that a very convenient hotel.

49.review_text: The pictures didn’t show the real condition of the actual rooms. Would appreciate if it was updated. It showed new renovated rooms but upon reaching, it was otherwise. Hope that tripadvisor could update it.

50.review_text: Located just near the fort in city(perfect location),the hotel is clean and provides u great hospitality.The staffs were very helpful.The hotel provides u almost every facilities from good rooms to desert safari,jeep safari,camel safari and tent stay. The rooftop cafeteria of hotel was great.wen i say food was great(i mean it :))Overall experience was awesome.I'll recommend dis hotel to every couple and families:). You wont regret,just be there:)

51.review_text: The Assistant  Manager, Banquet and technician in-charge give us a very good service! IWRAW-AP have a use Seri Pacific service for more than 5 Years! Hope they will remain this good service constantly !

52.review_text: i am a loyal customer to sri pacific. 4-6Dicember 2019 is a bad experience to me wt Sri Pacific.I feel bad to know that the hotel take advantage on me wt t price. to makeup the officer upgrade to lounge room that provide only 2 bttle mineral water.

53.review_text: The FO staff were very friendly and addressed me by name over the phone when I called to request for a trolley for check-out. Speed of checking-in was indeed a plus point. Across the road is a nice shopping mall and includes great eateries.

54.review_text: Alhamdulillah.. overall the hotel is very excellent with a good location, clean room, varieties of food choices for breakfast, good staff, clean and nice pool suitable for kids. Insha Allah will be the nice stay for u too!!

55.review_text: When I check in to the room the air con is down ,Bed is very bad ,room are not clean ,called very bad English speaking ,don't understand what they are talking ,change to another room air con not working and bed is better but still bed can't sleep well

56.review_text: Plus points for location (near LRT station, shopping complex), delicious food, stable Wifi all over lobby area and room.  but can improve on room cleanliness (dusty)-its triggered my allergy which i is very frustrating.

57.review_text: Clean hotel...easy to check in and check out. The check in staff hotel was very helpful when i book 3 rooms of king bed size. Then i wanted 1 of the room to be 2 single beds and all at the same floor. She was very helpful..

58.review_text: for short stay in KL it is nice and convenient as the location is next to a shopping mall and MRT station. The breakfast is good and the price per night affordable. It is friendly for Muslim visitors to KL.

59.review_text: I had the most amazing stay at hotel seri Pacific. Location is awesome just outside of the mall and bus stop which is very convenient. Hotel lobby also looks ROYALE. Rooms are well maintained but less lights and very dark. Hotel staff was very  supportive during event in ball room because of which it went flawless. I'd definitely recommend it for corporate meetings and events.

60.review_text: Seri Pacific is like a home away from home. The staff are very warm and accommodating. Our room is facing the twin towers (what a view!). The hotel ambiance is cozy and the breakfast selection is great.

61.review_text: Good location. Overall experience in room, facility and staff is very good. In cafe all food goods except nasi dagang was not very delicious, doesn't meet the taste of nasi dagang. Please improve the taste to meet the real Melayu traditional dish,

62.review_text: spacious rooms with all standard aminities. good location.. a shopping  mall just opposite the hotel connected via a bridge. Alos an MRT is connected to the hotel. Breakfast spread awesome. staff very helpful and courteous.  good for both buisenss and vacation stay.

63.review_text: Overall was clean and tidy, well decorated, very convenient if you wish to do shopping and have variety choices of meals just few steps move to the mall in front of hotel. The remark of bar section in the room was too small, staff should tell guest the location upon checking in.

64.review_text: Thanks to both Pn. Hidayah & Pn. Afzan who assisted me a lot throughout my reservation until the check-out day. Such a good experience and I will definitely repeat to stay at your place be it for travelling for work or family.

65.review_text: Strategically located, this hotel is value for money  ...i'm happy to say its' worth it . The room is quite spacious, very clean, very pleasant and comfortable. The FOOD at the Zende restaurant is delicious and so many varieties to choose from. There's a gym, spa and pool available, great facilities. For shoppers, just opposite of this hotel is a big shopping mall the Sunway Putra Mall. It's crazy! Love the location.

66.review_text: we really enjoy our stay in this beautiful hotel. Very nice room, very nice and clean toilet, very nice bed, very nice location, very friendly staff, very nice food. very excellent hotel. i highly this hotel to all travelers. Thank you very much for your hospitality.

67.review_text: Friendly, safe and cost-effective.   I like the breakfast options.  I like the hotel very much. But it is bit far away from Airport, and Shah Alam area, where is my company's factory.  Thanks for their great hospitality.  Highly recommended place to stay during your tour to Kuala Lampur, Malaysia

68.review_text: Upon Arrivel nobody help to take baggage and show the reception and room. There is no proper brousher about the hotel facilities and TV channel list.i would to think housekeeping room boy he is so active and professional.

69.review_text: The room is very spacious and comfortable. You can play a game with your young children to explore & find where the fridge, tea & coffee facilities and ironing board are as they are cleverly hidden behind the wall! Genius!!! My son was amazed on how they cleverly hide them to make the room look minimalist... Bed is quite on the hard side otherwise comfortable. Love the arrangement of the toilets with the separate shower & bath.. That means Father & Son do not need to argue about whoever is taking a long time to shower or bath!!! Haha! Even though you will notice that the interior looks kind of worn down but Overall, am just happy with the spaciousness of the room..  The breakfast array are just abundance... so many varieties to choose from... Being typical Malaysian, I chose the…

70.review_text: Good Location and breakfast with variety. Near to Putra Shopping Mall, PWTC and LRT station by walking distance. Near to Chow Kit, Jalan Tuanku Abd Rahman dan Pertama Complex. The staff and very friendly and helpful. One comment is that the check in process is very slow. It take 30 minutes.

71.review_text: Having a very comfortable holiday ever....nice hotel & great staff they have..thank you so much to madam Noorlizan with your warm welcome & beautiful smile..thank you also to all or your staff involve...excellent job 😍👍👍

72.review_text: Location is good and convenient to take Grab to go Bukit Bintang & Masjid India area. Rooms not very sound proof cos we can hear people talking from another room especially when they using the toilet.

73.review_text: Have stayed over numerous times and have had great service and excellent attention from staff all around. The club lounge manager to housekepping do a great job. Highly recomend 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Good job 💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙💙

74.review_text: friendly staff in club lounge,saravanan and shakila very helpful,the food for breakfast was very nice,I will recoment to my friend in this hotel next time,the room also very clean and perfect,staff in reservation also very help full tq guys

75.review_text: Excellent service. The location is perfect for me. Will be back. Abdurrazak during check in is very efficient and friendly. The check in was smooth and fast. Highly recommended to other travellers in KL.

76.review_text: Nice room.Good food and strategic location beside mall. Carpark need proper renovation.Very dodgy.However complimentary car park. Otherwise mall is nearby so can see movies and shopping.Facilities like gym well equipped.

77.review_text: The food very nice..the price so relevent!! Best place to treat your family or group party!! Tq to ita..what a very nice person..😊 the zende restaurant have so many delight food suitable for all & ur kids!!

78.review_text: All Good, but parking car for check in Very difficult to find. Please considers visitor before check in not only on receiptionist. All things Good and will Recomended to my friends. Food also Good. Thanks

79.review_text: Service Cleanliness,all hotel suff ,Sleep Quality and Location are excellent..Breakfast is good.This time leaved midnigt.Morning call, chech ott, hotel taxi are all preparation. Cold Store is located near the hotel, so you can buy daily necessities and liquor.

80.review_text: Spacious room, very good amenities, near shopping mall and train station, very clean except for the bathroom due to age of the hotel, neat ironing and fridge locker........ Value for money, free parking

81.review_text: overall is Good and Ok.  good place to go for refreshment on weekend.  room dining is also OK and Nice. suitable for bring a child. very near to shopping mall and easy to access for mall & public transport

82.review_text: Stayed here for two nights, room was large with a lovely big comfortable bed.  Usual free toiletries in the room.  Breakfast was very impressive, with lots of different sections, western, malay etc. Bar was ok, went there once for a cold beer, unfortunately every table has an ash tray, didn't see a no smoking area. This hotel is perfect for jumping on the train to get to the batu caves. I would stay again

83.review_text: Travelling with my wife, we were actually skeptical at first about booking this property but then we gave it the benefit of the doubt. As this is our first visit to Kuala Lumpur, we decided to stay here. Very near shopping malls, food, public transport access. Upon arrival check-in was a breeze, hotel staff was fast and friendly. Got outselves a good upgrade to the Club Floor. Evening cocktail at the club lounge was bliss. We enjoyed every bit of it, not to mention exceptional service from a lovely Miss Ayu. She was very helpful and had gone the extra mile in making us feel so much at home. Will definitely return on our next visit. Keep up the good hospitality!!

84.review_text: Value for money, great location which is near to a major shopping complex, not far from other business districts, excellent service and support staff who are always polite and smiling, thus this hotel is highly recommended!

85.review_text: Reputed hotel best value for the price. The location is excellent with public transport access. Breakfast spread was nice with choices of types. The hot tea and hot milk was not hot enough. Hit poridge was missing

86.review_text: My usual choice any time for bed & breakfast around pwtc area. Friendly staff & variety of foods. Near shopping mall & public transport. will always be my favorite place to stay. i have no idea what to write to meet the 200 minimum character criteria.

87.review_text: My first trip to Malaysia.  I chose Seri Pacific based on online reviews and yes everything turned great. Great service , great team, great food, great location . I loved it!room. Spacious hotel room , I truly highly recommend it .

88.review_text: Worth every penny since the price is reasonable, good breakfast spread & very strategic location. The room is also comfortable with nice city view. My kids love this hotel since it has a bathtub in the room :) ,will definitely come back!

89.review_text: I stay for a night as i have the event in PWTC. The room was spacious and i love that the room has bath up and shower separately. I love the room arrangement as my kids can play comfortably.  The swimming pool are fine. And i ordered room services breakfast. And it turn out to be wonderful and delicious with kind of range and reasonable price.Fall in love with the teh tarik...  As i travel a lot..my kids fall in love with this hotel.It is also easy as it is connected directly to Sunway Putra Mall which we can find a lot of dining places, clothing stores and easy access of Grab.  And surprisingly, i did check out a bit late like 2 pm but they did not charge me late check put charges. I am so happy with their services. Wish would come back again.  Keep up the good work.

90.review_text: Incapable arranging transport to MITEC. Waiting 25 minutes for a damn taxi. Crap service from this hotel. It was supposed to be arranged through the hotel. Same problem this morning. Never staying here again.

91.review_text: Close to the mall and RLT. Good selections of breakfast, nice shower, but poor sound proofing. Staff service in the breakfast area should be improved.They collected all our utensils twice, even we kept our jackets on our chairs.

92.review_text: Two-thumbs up! It is connected to PWTC. The food was great. The staff are friendly. In terms of cleanliness, I am very satisfied. The hotel is situated at a very strategic location. The Sunway Putra Mall is located at the opposite of the hotel so we could hang out a lil bit.

93.review_text: Really nice and cozy place. Large room with view on petronas towers. There are shampoo, conditioner gel and others. The personnel is helpful, no problems with special requests. Great location near PWTC and Mall. The Breakfast was good.. definitely will come again.

94.review_text: perfect stay, np. need to explain i details. Breakfasts might be better by adding more fruits. Fruit juices could be more fruity. No complaints at all Staffv members at the reception were extremely helpful..

95.review_text: The hotel was quite good, clean and efficient. Check-in and check-out were very fast. Rooms/bathrooms were tidy. I travelled with my family for a vacation, and the only problem was that the breakfast buffet was quite limited for vegetarians.

96.review_text: I think you need to confirm from the guest before charging for any services and specially when it is all paid services. If there is some ambiguity then you should take it up with the organisation who has made the arrangements instead of charging the  guest. the washrooms and rooms were not properly cleaned and there was hair and undergarments from a previous lady resident around Since the hotel is located away from the main areas for tourists there should be some arrangements for commuting to these places

97.review_text: Nice Property it was were easy to locate. , very clean and well maintained , the check in and check out was done quickly did not have to wait. the room were clean and well maintained  and the staff was were warm and well mannered

98.review_text: Worst bed ever, was told it was a new mattress? Ended up with a topper and 2 quilts on it to be bearable. Hotel organised a couple of good tours. Buffet breakfast was below average. Nothing was hot. The milk for cereal was room temperature. The western section was not western food at all. Had a great view of the Petronas Towers. The shower was awesome! Huge rainfall shower head and great pressure. Had a nice dinner there, a la carte, not the buffet. No laundry facilities. Pool was ok. Excellent location. Close to LRT, MRT and Monorail. Opposite an awesome huge new mall with many food options. Now we only used our credit card at this hotel during our trip and it was compromised, however I have no proof. Bank is investigating. Be careful.

99.review_text: the hotel is just beside the Putra World Trade Centre, Kuala Lumpur and also you can just cross the street to the Sunway Putra Mall. easy to find food and drinks. Near to the LRT station as it is just inside the mall.

100.review_text: The hotel room is spacious and value for money. The service during arrival / check in is OK only (not really pleasent nor friendly). However, overall is above average.will consider to stay here again.
